item.nzh-sem:metakeywords: Technology, National, Banking
item.title: MetService latest NZ organisation to be hit by targeted cyber attack
item.description:
MetService is the latest organisation to be hit by the same cyber attack that crashed the NZX website for five days.
The weather forecaster was hit by a DDoS (distributed denial of service) attack today ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202036/cyber_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Metservice is the latest organisation to be on the end of a targeted cyber attack. Photo / 123RF

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202036/tsb_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=TSB Bank's online services went down this afternoon, but the bank would not say if it was a cyber attack or not. Photo / Warren Buckland
